TopicTitle: War of Insanity Unofficial Fan and Informational page (seeking new members)

Articles.Content: sorry, but what i went through to get the game on the Star Wars forums, I'm not letting that go to waste.

sorry, but what i went through to get the game on the Star Wars forums, I'm not letting that go to waste.

Understandable, i was NOT about to make the decision myself. All i am doing is maintaining this thread.
What matters is the journey, not the destination. Don't get so attached to something worse because you worked hard for it, always choose the better path.

What matters is the journey, not the destination. Don't get so attached to something worse because you worked hard for it, always choose the better path.

I'm going to stay neutral on this one.

Btw, i think i finally found a good song for my character's theme.

Actually, i had an idea, don't kill yourself off, xannari, we stay on the star warsforum for the duration of part 3. Since you do not want to be a,part of that forum community, we'll just say you were on another mission during part 3. Will that satisfy you, xannari?

That would be a bit difficult given the current position I'm in, but whatever.

I don't think you know what would make me happy. What I want is for you guys to not be hindered by me, which seems a bit impossible. If we're changing the profiles regardless, how would this introduce any drawbacks?
Why can't we do this on the MC foums?
Xannari? Not sure! BTW, what do you think f Laythe's idea?
I think my idea is awesome. Of course, I'm not biased or anything, right?

I think my idea is awesome. Of course, I'm not biased or anything, right?

Lol, and laythe, i am not discounting your idea at all, but, frankly, my remaining in the series may be dependent on xannari's. That was why i put up that idea so we could actually start the 3rd part (i am just going to end the second part with a paragraph.

Lemme introduce you to the angry me:

Suck it up buttercups! The Web address has zero bearing on anything. If people are going to cut their noses off to spite their face, so be it.

Yall are incorrigible! This is about the story you write not the pages you write it on. Would you choose to not read a book because of the type of paper? I don't think so.

I'm on my phone at DCI now so yall are spared from the wrath of a full rant.

Would you choose to not read a book because of the type of paper? I don't think so.

You've got it all wrong. I'd want to read a book at a library, because it's a place dedicated for books, and you can read for free. I wouldn't want to go to a convention that requires an entry fee, just to go read a book in the far corner of the building.

You've got it all wrong. I'd want to read a book at a library, because it's a place dedicated for books, and you can read for free. I wouldn't want to go to a convention that requires an entry fee, just to go read a book in the far corner of the building.

From what i observed of the site, they aren't asking for money. If the link i provided got you to a place that is asking for money, then you should have let me know.

It's a metaphor...
